statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_signatures WHERE block_number = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, signature_data FROM blockchain_signatures WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, block_number FROM blockchain_signatures WHERE signature_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_signatures WHERE transaction_hash LIKE 'abc%';
SELECT signature_id, timestamp FROM blockchain_signatures WHERE block_number BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_signatures ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, block_number FROM blockchain_signatures WHERE block_number > 100 ORDER BY block_number ASC;
SELECT signature_id, transaction_id, timestamp FROM blockchain_signatures WHERE transaction_hash LIKE '%abc%' ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_signatures WHERE block_number = 50 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT signature_id, transaction_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_signatures WHERE block_number BETWEEN 200 AND 300 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT key_id, public_key, private_key FROM signature_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_hash LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM signature_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT public_key, private_key FROM signature_keys WHERE public_key = '\x04E4F96B45764D2FD3A5CB70A9D603F6E04B9618D77978A71D3A2D83F135EB66A';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions JOIN signature_keys ON blockchain_transactions.transaction_id = signature_keys.key_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_data FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM signature_metadata ORDER BY signing_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_status FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status='pending';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transaction_history;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_id = '808e86a5-3027-4a1e-94b5-dc21ae8a7326';
SELECT transaction_data FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE digital_signature IS NOT NULL;
SELECT transaction_id, digital_signature FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM signature_metadata WHERE signer_name = 'Alice' AND signing_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_status FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status LIKE '%successful%' ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, public_key FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, transaction_id FROM signatures WHERE signature = 'example_signature';
SELECT id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM signatures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, transaction_id FROM signatures WHERE signature LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, hash, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE TIMESTAMP > '2022-01-01T00:00:00Z';
SELECT * FROM digital_signatures;
SELECT id, transaction_id FROM digital_signatures ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT miner_id, miner_name, mining_power FROM miners WHERE mining_power > 50;
SELECT * FROM digital_signatures WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT signature FROM digital_signatures WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice' AND receiver_address = 'Bob' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_number, miner_address FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE block_number > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT miner_name, mining_power FROM miners WHERE mining_power > 10.0;
